SELECT A.* FROM( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER( ORDER BY A.ij_sort_ord DESC, A.ij_wdate DESC) RUWNUM, ROW_NUMBER() OVER( ORDER BY A.ij_sort_ord ASC, A.ij_wdate ASC) RUWNUM_SHOW, TRIM(A.IJ_ID_NUM) BOARD_ID, TO_CHAR(A.IJ_WDATE,'YYYY.MM.DD') IJ_WDATE, A.IJ_CO_NAME, A.IJ_WTITLE, A.IJ_CO_SEP, A.IJ_USE_AT, A.IJ_MENU_CODE, A.IJ_RECOUNT, A.IJ_JOB_SEP, A.IJ_AREA, A.IJ_INT_ID, A.IJ_USE, A.IJ_SORT_ORD, NVL(B.CODE_NAME,'') SIDO_AREA, NVL(C.CODE_NAME,'') GUGUN_AREA, NVL(D.CODE_NAME,'') JOB_NAME, lead(A.IJ_ID_NUM,1) over (order by A.ij_sort_ord DESC) pre_id, lag(A.IJ_ID_NUM,1) over (order by A.ij_sort_ord DESC) next_id, lead(A.IJ_SORT_ORD,1) over (order by A.ij_sort_ord DESC) pre_sort_ord, lag(A.IJ_SORT_ORD,1) over (order by A.ij_sort_ord DESC) next_sort_ord FROM INFO_JOB A LEFT JOIN CODEBASE B ON B.system_code ='KP' AND B.CODE_ID = 'DIST_CLS' AND SUBSTR(A.IJ_AREA, 0, 2) = B.CODE LEFT JOIN CODEBASE C ON C.system_code ='KP' AND C.CODE_ID = CONCAT('DIST',SUBSTR(A.IJ_AREA,0,2)) AND A.IJ_AREA = C.CODE LEFT JOIN CODEBASE D ON D.system_code ='KP' AND D.CODE_ID = 'HIRE_TYP' AND D.CODE = A.IJ_JOB_SEP WHERE IJ_MENU_CODE = '001' AND ((IJ_USE <> 0 AND IJ_INT_ID = #ijIntId#) OR IJ_USE = 1)
AND IJ_JOB_SEP = #ijJobSep#
AND IJ_JOB_SEP <> 1
AND IJ_CO_SEP = #ijCoSep#
AND IJ_CO_SEP = '1'
AND SUBSTR(A.IJ_AREA, 0, 2) = #searchType1#
AND A.IJ_EMP_SEP = #searchType2#
AND A.IJ_JOB_SEP = #searchType2#
AND (UPPER(A.IJ_WTITLE) LIKE '%'||UPPER(#searchKeyword#)||'%' OR UPPER(A.IJ_CO_NAME) LIKE '%'||UPPER(#searchKeyword#)||'%' )
ORDER BY RUWNUM_SHOW DESC )A WHERE A.RUWNUM BETWEEN #pageIndex# AND (#pageIndex#-1)+#pageSize#

SELECT SEQ_NUM AS FILE_ID, FILESIZE AS FILE_SIZE, FILENAME AS FILE_NM, HOST_FILENAME AS FILE_MASK FROM INFO_JOB_FILE WHERE RTRIM(ID_NUM) = #boardId#

SELECT A.IJ_ID_NUM, A.IJ_WNAME, A.IJ_EMAIL, TO_CHAR(A.IJ_WDATE,'YYYY.MM.DD') IJ_WDATE, A.IJ_WTITLE, A.IJ_CONTENT, A.IJ_RECOUNT, A.IJ_USE, A.IJ_SOURCE, A.IJ_INT_ID, A.IJ_P_NUM_ID, A.IJ_P_LEVEL, A.IJ_P_SERIAL, A.IJ_HOMEP, A.IJ_FAX, A.IJ_TEL, A.IJ_HP, A.IJ_CO_NAME, A.IJ_DAMDANG, A.IJ_DEPART, A.IJ_AREA, A.IJ_SEX,
(SELECT CODE_NAME FROM CODEBASE WHERE CODE_ID = 'CAREER_TYP' AND LANG_KND = 'ko' AND CODE = A.IJ_CAREER ) IJ_CAREER, (SELECT CODE_NAME FROM CODEBASE WHERE CODE_ID = 'FNL_EDU' AND LANG_KND = 'ko' AND CODE = A.IJ_LASTSCHOOL ) IJ_LASTSCHOOL, A.IJ_JOB_TERM_SEP, TO_CHAR(A.IJ_JOB_TERM,'YYYY.MM.DD') IJ_JOB_TERM, A.IJ_JOB_SEP, A.IJ_YEAR_SEP, A.IJ_YEAR, A.IJ_MENU_CODE, A.IJ_APPLICATION, (SELECT CODE_NAME FROM CODEBASE WHERE CODE_ID = 'PAY_TYP' AND LANG_KND = 'ko' AND CODE = A.IJ_PAY ) IJ_PAY, A.IJ_EMPLOY, (SELECT CODE_NAME FROM CODEBASE WHERE CODE_ID = 'COMP_TYP' AND LANG_KND = 'ko' AND CODE = A.IJ_CO_SEP ) IJ_CO_SEP, A.IJ_PREFER, (SELECT CODE_NAME FROM CODEBASE WHERE CODE_ID = 'AT_CERT_PREF' AND LANG_KND = 'ko' AND CODE = A.IJ_AT ) IJ_AT, A.IJ_ADDR, A.IJ_TRANS, (SELECT CODE_NAME FROM CODEBASE WHERE CODE_ID = 'EMP_TYP' AND LANG_KND = 'ko' AND CODE = A.IJ_EMP_SEP ) IJ_EMP_SEP, A.IJ_USE_AT, A.IJ_RECOUNT_AT, A.IJ_SORT_ORD, A.IJ_UNPUB_RSN, A.IJ_INCRUIT_YN, NVL(B.CODE_NAME,'') SIDO_AREA, NVL(C.CODE_NAME,'') GUGUN_AREA, NVL(D.CODE_NAME,'') JOB_NAME FROM INFO_JOB A LEFT JOIN CODEBASE B ON B.system_code ='KP' AND B.CODE_ID = 'DIST_CLS' AND SUBSTR(A.IJ_AREA, 0, 2) = B.CODE LEFT JOIN CODEBASE C ON C.system_code ='KP' AND C.CODE_ID = CONCAT('DIST',SUBSTR(A.IJ_AREA,0,2)) AND A.IJ_AREA = C.CODE LEFT JOIN CODEBASE D ON D.system_code ='KP' AND D.CODE_ID = 'HIRE_TYP' AND D.CODE = A.IJ_JOB_SEP WHERE RTRIM(A.IJ_ID_NUM) = #boardId#
